applicantName.description: Legal name of the business entity seeking workers comp coverage

mailingAddress.description: Primary mailing address for the insured; official correspondence address

officePhone.description: Main business phone number of the insured

mobilePhone.description: Mobile phone of the primary insured contact

website.description: Official website of the insured business

yearsInBusiness.description: Number of years the business has operated (under current or predecessor ownership)

fein.description: Federal Employer Identification Number (9-digit tax ID) for the insured

ncciRiskId.description: NCCI-assigned Risk ID used for experience rating and WC data

otherEmployerRegistrationNumber.description: Any state or other rating bureau employer registration number

submissionType.description: Type of transaction requested: quote only, bind/issue, or assigned risk/other special handling

agencyName.description: Name of the broker/agency submitting the risk

agencyAddress.description: Mailing address of the submitting agency

producerName.description: Primary producer/agent managing the account at the agency

producerEmail.description: Email address of the main producer contact

underwriterName.description: Carrier underwriter the submission is being addressed to (if specified)

agencyCustomerId.description: Internal account identifier used in the agency's system

billingPlan.description: Whether the account will be agency-billed or direct-billed and any special billing instructions

paymentPlan.description: Requested installment schedule (annual, quarterly, monthly reporting, etc.)

auditType.description: How and when payroll audit is performed (at expiration vs. periodic self-reporting)

entityType.description: Legal entity type (LLC, Corporation, Partnership, Sole Proprietorship, etc.)

operationsDescription.description: Detailed description of business operations and activities

hazardousMaterialsExposure.description: Whether business handles or is exposed to hazardous materials

aircraftOrWatercraftOwned.description: Whether business owns aircraft or watercraft

workUndergroundOrAbove15Feet.description: Whether work is performed underground or above 15 feet

workOverWater.description: Whether work is performed over water

workSubletWithoutCOI.description: Whether work is sublet without certificates of insurance

otherBusinessOperations.description: Other business operations not covered by standard questions

safetyProgramInOperation.description: Whether a formal safety program is in operation

groupTransportationProvided.description: Whether group transportation is provided to employees

employeesUnder16OrOver60.description: Whether business employs workers under 16 or over 60

volunteerOrDonatedLabor.description: Whether business uses volunteer or donated labor

employeesWithPhysicalHandicaps.description: Whether business employs workers with physical handicaps

employeesTravelOutOfState.description: Whether employees travel out of state for work

otherInsuranceWithThisInsurer.description: Whether insured has other insurance policies with this insurer

priorCoverageDeclinedOrCancelled.description: Whether prior coverage was declined or cancelled

employeeHealthPlansProvided.description: Whether employee health plans are provided

taxLiensOrBankruptcyLast5Years.description: Whether business has had tax liens or bankruptcy in last 5 years

unpaidWCPremiumLast5Years.description: Whether business has unpaid WC premium in last 5 years

locationFloor.description: Floor or suite number if applicable

classification.description: Array of classification objects (per state & class code)

wcState.description: State for which this classification applies

classCode.description: NCCI class code for this classification

dutiesDescription.description: Description of duties performed under this classification

estimatedAnnualPayroll.description: Estimated annual payroll for this classification

rate.description: Rate per $100 of payroll for this classification

estimatedAnnualManualPremium.description: Estimated annual manual premium for this classification

otherStatesInsuranceStatesPart3.description: States covered under Part 3 (Other States Insurance)

employersLiabilityDiseasePolicyLimit.description: Employers Liability limit - Disease Policy Limit

employersLiabilityDiseaseEachEmployee.description: Employers Liability limit - Disease Each Employee

uslhCoverage.description: Whether USLH (US Longshore and Harbor Workers) coverage is included

volunteerCompCoverage.description: Whether Volunteer Compensation coverage is included

payrollByClassAndState.description: Payroll breakdown by class code and state

priorNumberOfClaims.description: Number of claims under prior carrier

priorAmountPaid.description: Total amount paid on prior claims

claimStatus.description: Status of the claim (Open, Closed, etc.)

individualIncludeOrExcludeWC.description: Whether individual is included or excluded from WC coverage

totalEstimatedAnnualPremiumAllStates.description: Total estimated annual premium across all states

totalMinimumPremiumAllStates.description: Total minimum premium across all states

totalDepositPremiumAllStates.description: Total deposit premium across all states
